definition: to come into existence as a legally enforceable claim
to come about as a natural growth, increase, or advantage
examples: the wisdom that accrues with age

definition: to come as a direct result of some state or action
examples: rewards due to the feminine will accrue to me

definition: to accumulate or be added periodically
examples: interest accrues on a daily basis

definition: to accumulate or have due after a period of time
